Title: #371: Staying Unified As You Grow with Steve Atkinson
Description:
With 1.8 million subscribers and over 100 million views since its inception, BibleProject—one of the most popular Bible-based channels on YouTube—has experienced meteoric growth since its launch less than six years ago. And that hasn’t been by accident. Tune in as Executive Director Steve Atkinson shares how the nonprofit animation studio stays laser-focused on its singular mission and why showing your team you care pays limitless returns.
